channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google.org commits $20M to researchers using AI for scientific breakthroughs
item.description: Google is committing $20 million in cash and $2 million in cloud credits to a new funding initiative designed to help scientists and researchers unear...

item.title: HyperX QuadCast 2 S Review: Your Favorite Streamer’s Next USB Mic
item.description: The most iconic microphone on Twitch just got a lot better.

item.title: Sam Altman will co-chair San Francisco mayor-elect Daniel Lurie’s transition team
item.description: San Francisco’s mayor-elect, Daniel Lurie, has tapped OpenAI CEO Sam Altman to help run his transition team, the campaign announced on Monday, as part...

item.title: Ex-Duolingo execs raise $13M for startup making it easier to access a college education
item.description: As college tuition increases and the student loan debt crisis continues, three former executives from language learning app Duolingo are building a ne...

item.title: Clip Ebike Conversion Kit: An Affordable but Inconvenient Solution
item.description: The world’s first no-tools-necessary ebike conversion kit is a great concept but still has some bugs to work out.

item.title: Perplexity introduces a shopping feature for Pro users in the U.S.
item.description: AI-powered search engine Perplexity is venturing into e-commerce. On Monday, the company debuted a new shopping feature for its paid customers in the ...

item.title: Neural DSP Nano Cortex Review: The Perfect Portable Amp Modeler
item.description: This amp modeling pedal delivers the same sonic quality as its highly regarded older brother at a fraction of the price.

item.title: Automatic Braking Systems Save Lives. Now They'll Need to Work at 62 MPH
item.description: A new report from AAA says newer systems prevent twice the number of collisions—and save lives. Regulators have ordered an expansion of the tech, but ...

item.title: Tanner Leatherstein's Viral Mission to Save You From Bad Luxury Bags
item.description: Meet the man on a crusade to uncover which high-end handbags and leather goods are worth your hard-earned cash—by tearing them apart.

item.title: ElevenLabs now offers ability to build conversational AI agents
item.description: ElevenLabs, a startup that provides AI voice cloning and a text-to-speech API, launched the ability to build conversational AI bots on Monday. The com...
